Enter a range of LIMS IDs then click 'Save'. To print a single label leave the max LIMS ID blank.
To print a subset of labels, separate LIMS IDs by comma, space, or hard return

displayItem.label: Institute or Lab
displayItem.value: (Add new institutes at task 'Manage Settings')
displayItem.sql: select appValue from vwLinx_AppValues where appValueType = 'Institute' order by appValue

displayItem.value: To save a new Project enter data and then click 'Save'

displayItem.label: Project Manager
displayItem.value: (Add new project managers at task 'Manage Users')
displayItem.sql: select username from VWLinx_AccessControl where featureName = 'All' and userName not in('linx','tjs','wildtype') order by userName
